Title: Relates to harassment through electronic communication
Summary: Requires the municipal police training council to develop policies and procedures regarding the use of internet technology and the use of such technology to perpetuate harassment or other crimes.
LawCode: Amd ยง840, Exec L; amd ยง79-n, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the civil rights law, in relation to harassment through electronic communication
